Types

Schema = OrderedTableRef[FieldName, FieldTypeDef]
complex objects 
FieldName = string
the field name doubles as the pattern 
FieldType = enum
  Anything,                   ## anything or nothing (nullable)
  Primitive,                  ## a primitive value (integer, string, etc.)
  List,                       ## an array
  Either,                     ## one of 2+ possible values
  Complex                     ## a map-like object
variant discriminator for value types 
FieldTypeDef = ref object
  kinds*: set[JsonNodeKind]
  pattern*: bool
  required*: bool
  case kind*: FieldType
  of Anything, Primitive:
    nil
  of Either:
      a*: FieldTypeDef
      b*: FieldTypeDef

  of List:
      member*: FieldTypeDef

  of Complex:
      schema*: Schema
the type for any given value 
HttpOpName = enum
  Get = "get", Put = "put", Post = "post", Delete = "delete", Options = "options",
  Head = "head", Patch = "patch"
Scheme {...}{.pure.} = enum
  Https = "https", Http = "http", Wss = "wss", Ws = "ws"
ConsumeResult = object of RootObj
  ok*: bool
  schema*: Schema
  js*: JsonNode
  ast*: NimNode

GuessTypeResult = tuple[major: JsonNodeKind, minor: string]

the field may be represented by either of two types

the field name associated with this value is a regex

the field name associated with this value isn't a regex

any type, even null; defaults to optional

any type, even null; defaults to optional

    tags: [].}
a robust getter for string values in json

    raises: [KeyError, UnpackError], tags: [].}
find and return the content of a json ref, if possible 
proc guessJsonNodeKind(name: string): Option[JsonNodeKind] {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
map openapi type names to their json node types

    raises: [KeyError, UnpackError], tags: [].}
guess the JsonNodeKind of a node/schema, perhaps dereferencing

    tags: [].}
makes a typedef given node kind and optional format; (this should someday handle arbitrary formats) 
proc isKeyword(identifier: string): bool {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
true if the given identifier is a nim keyword 
proc isValidNimIdentifier(s: string): bool {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}
